job.title: Software Developer (C#/.NET)
job.description: ltpgtas a software developer your versatile tasks will concentrate to the manufacturing management software which the most advanced production planning and execution software in industry ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtthe job requires experience in c programming and net and knowhow from angular or other modern web frameworks is an advantageltpgtltpgtcommissioning of the automation system is often finalized at the customer so you need to be willing to travel and have the capabilities to work independently in an international business environment thus you must have the ability to act independently with a cando attitude in demanding specialist tasks good written and verbal communication skills in english are essential as wellltpgtltpgtkey technologies c sql html typescript angular v nodejsampnbspltpgtltpgtnice to have jenkins docker and robot frameworkltpgtltligtltligt
